languages.text: "Эх, фон-Валаншество, вот это я понимаю — твердое решение Вольного Торговца! Вижу, шаттл с Хейдари уже на полной тяге спешит по нашим координатам. Добро". {n}Тото Стервятник довольно причмокивает.{/n} "Хозяин шлет вам великую благодарность, Святейшество. И обещается впредь каждый терранский год подтвержать ее дорогими подарками".

traits.locale_text: "Эх, фон-Валаншество, вот это я понимаю — твердое решение Вольного Торговца! Вижу, шаттл с Хейдари уже на полной тяге спешит по нашим координатам. Добро". {n}Тото Стервятник довольно причмокивает.{/n} "Хозяин шлет вам великую благодарность, Святейшество. И обещается впредь каждый терранский год подтвержать ее дорогими подарками".

languages.text: "Oh yes, Your von Valanciusness, now that's how a Rogue Trader does business! I see the shuttle with Heydari on it is already speeding its way toward our coordinates. Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran year."

Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran cycle."

languages.text: “噢，太棒了，冯·瓦兰修斯大人，这才是行商浪人做生意的方式！我已经看到，载着海达利的穿梭机朝我们的坐标飞过来了，很好。”{n}秃鹫托托满意地咂着嘴。{/n}“我的老板向你致以最诚挚的谢意，大人。他还承诺，会在每个泰拉年为你奉上昂贵的礼物，以表谢意。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, Your von Valanciusness, now that's how a Rogue Trader does business! I see the shuttle with Heydari on it is already speeding its way toward our coordinates. Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran year."

traits.locale_text: “噢，太棒了，冯·瓦兰修斯大人，这才是行商浪人做生意的方式！我已经看到，载着海达利的穿梭机朝我们的坐标飞过来了，很好。”{n}秃鹫托托满意地咂着嘴。{/n}“我的老板向你致以最诚挚的谢意，大人。他还承诺，会在每个泰拉周期为你奉上昂贵的礼物，以表谢意。”

languages.text: «¡Sí, claro, su von Valanciedad! Así negocian los Comerciantes Independientes. Veo que la lanzadera con Heydari a bordo ya se dirige hacia las coordenadas. Bien». {n}Toto el Buitre se relame, satisfecho.{/n} «Mi jefe le agradece el servicio, su santidad, y promete demostrar su agradecimiento con regalos de gran valor cada año de Terra».
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, Your von Valanciusness, now that's how a Rogue Trader does business! I see the shuttle with Heydari on it is already speeding its way toward our coordinates. Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran year."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí, claro, su von Valanciedad! Así negocian los Comerciantes Independientes. Veo que la lanzadera con Heydari a bordo ya se dirige hacia las coordenadas. Bien». {n}Toto el Buitre se relame, satisfecho.{/n} «Mi jefe le agradece el servicio, su santidad, y promete demostrar su agradecimiento con regalos de gran valor cada ciclo de Terra».

languages.text: 「ああ、いいねえ、フォン・ヴァランシウス様よ。これが自由開拓者のやり方か！ヘイダリ入りのシャトルはもう加速して座標に向かってんだな。バッチリだ」{n}ハゲタカのトトは満足げに唇を鳴らす。{/n}「ボスは大いに感謝してるよ、聖人様。それと、感謝の印に1地球年毎に高価な贈り物を送るって約束だ」
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, Your von Valanciusness, now that's how a Rogue Trader does business! I see the shuttle with Heydari on it is already speeding its way toward our coordinates. Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran year."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、いいねえ、フォン・ヴァランシウス様よ。これが自由開拓者のやり方か！ヘイダリ入りのシャトルはもう加速して座標に向かってんだな。バッチリだ」{n}ハゲタカのトトは満足げに唇を鳴らす。{/n}「ボスは大いに感謝してるよ、聖人様。それと、感謝の印に1地球年毎に高価な贈り物を送るって約束だ」

languages.text: « Bravo, Votre von Valanciusité, je reconnais bien là l'acuité commerciale d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! Je vois que la capsule d'Heydari vole déjà à toute vitesse vers nos coordonnées. Parfait, {n}dit Toto avec un claquement de lèvres satisfait.{/n} Mon patron vous envoie ses plus sincères remerciements, Votre Sainteté, et il promet aussi de vous couvrir de cadeaux précieux à chaque an de Terra. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, Your von Valanciusness, now that's how a Rogue Trader does business! I see the shuttle with Heydari on it is already speeding its way toward our coordinates. Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran year."

traits.locale_text: « Bravo, Votre von Valanciusité, je reconnais bien là l'acuité commerciale d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! Je vois que la capsule d'Heydari vole déjà à toute vitesse vers nos coordonnées. Parfait, {n}dit Toto avec un claquement de lèvres satisfait.{/n} Mon patron vous envoie ses plus sincères remerciements, Votre Sainteté, et il promet aussi de vous couvrir de cadeaux précieux à chaque cycle de Terra. »

languages.text: "Ja, genau, Eure von Valanciusheit, so macht {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} Geschäfte! Ich sehe, das Shuttle mit Heydari ist bereits unterwegs zu unseren Koordinaten. Gut." {n}Toto der Aasgeier leckt sich zufrieden die Lippen.{/n} "Mein Boss schickt seinen ergebensten Dank, Eure Heiligkeit. Und er verspricht zum Ausgleich teure Geschenke zu jedem Terra-Jahr."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, Your von Valanciusness, now that's how a Rogue Trader does business! I see the shuttle with Heydari on it is already speeding its way toward our coordinates. Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran year."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, genau, Eure von Valanciusheit, so macht {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} Geschäfte! Ich sehe, das Shuttle mit Heydari ist bereits unterwegs zu unseren Koordinaten. Gut." {n}Toto der Aasgeier leckt sich zufrieden die Lippen.{/n} "Mein Boss schickt seinen ergebensten Dank, Eure Heiligkeit. Und er verspricht zum Ausgleich teure Geschenke zu jedem Terra-Zyklus."

languages.text: "Ha şöyle von Valancius Hazretleri! Hür Tacir dediğin böyle iş yapar! Heydari'nin mekiği, koordinatlarımıza doğru yola çıkmış bile. Güzel." {n}Akbaba Toto, dudaklarını memnuniyetle şapırdatıyor.{/n} "Patronum, yüce şahsınıza en içten teşekkürlerini sunuyor. Kendisi her Terra yılı kıymetli hediyelerle bu teşekkürlerini sunmayı sürdürecektir."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, Your von Valanciusness, now that's how a Rogue Trader does business! I see the shuttle with Heydari on it is already speeding its way toward our coordinates. Good." {n}Toto the Vulture smacks his lips in satisfaction.{/n} "My boss sends his deepest thanks, Your Holiness. And he promises to back up his thanks with expensive gifts every Terran year."

Kendisi her Terra yılı kıymetli hediyelerle bu teşekkürlerini sunmayı sürdürecektir."
